task.title: View Data Source Information
task.shortdesc: View data source information on theData Sources page.

context.p: To view the data source information:

step.cmd: Open the Data Sources screen, by clicking the Data Sources icon. in the left navigation bar.

info.p: The Data Sources page opens showing defined data categories.

step.cmd: Click the data category that contains the data source, so that it expands and shows the data source.
Click the data source name. The page for the data source opens on the Data Policy screen. Do any of the following:

choices.choice: View data policy information on the Data Policy screen.
Click the Ingest Data tab to see data ingest settings.
Click the Data Processing Function tab to see the DPF associated with this data source.
